text: The Cambridge School was established by Mr. Collins and Mrs. Flavia Albuquerque. The school is affiliated to CBSE.http://www.cambridgeschoolmangalore.com/ The principal is currently Mrs. Shaila Saldanha. The school was established in 2007 and is located at Paldane in Mangalore. == Facilities and amenities == The various facilities offered by this school are * Science Lab * Audio visual Lab * Swimming pool * Playground * Dance classes * Music classes * Sports classes * Arts/craft classes ==References== Category:Schools in Mangalore Category:Educational institutions established in 2007
title: Cambridge School (Neermarga)
